Visibility: 24.1 km

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Sunny. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 late this morning. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow beginning after midnight. Local blowing snow overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 41 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
